reviewText: I actually have never seen this VHS, but I have heard a recording.  I had no idea, at the time, who Chonda Pierce was, but I soon grew to love her.  I literally laughed until I cried.  The "communion cups turned shot glasses" story had to be the best.
We have two Chonda Pierce videos.  She's funny, entertaining and uplifting.  We love her and just watching her blesses your heart. I saw her in person in Phoenix and she's fantastic!
